description:
Sky Survivors is an arena shooter roguelite. Choose from a variety of skills, unlock unique characters and weapons. Build «stairway to heaven» — a sky tower, each floor of which gives your character a unique bonus. Create your own overpowered build to survive against hordes of monsters!

Features: 
■ Auto-aim mode.
■ Over 100 different skills to choose from.
■ «Stairway to Heaven» — each floor has its own unique bonuses.
■ Unique weapons that completely change your playstyle.
■ Diverse characters with unique abilities.
■ Multiple game modes allow you to choose the playstyle to your liking.
name: Sky Survivors
intro: Create your own overpowered build to survive against hordes of monsters!
